EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Strategies for Testing SaaS Applications - 2015.03.05.Email - Follow U
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our Strategies for Testing SaaS Applications webinar!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Strategies for Testing SaaS Applications
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you for attending our webinar, Strategies for Testing SaaS Applications! We hope you found the webinar informative and helpful. Your active participation and engaging questions made the difference.
Click here <http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-strategies-for-testing-saas-applications-watch.html> for a recording of this webinar, or visit our Resource page <http://www.tricentis.com/resources/> for more presentations.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>.
Thanks, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Bill Martorelli Principal Analyst Forrester Research
Wolfgang Platz Founder and Chief Product Officer Tricentis
